messages.subject: Homeschooled runners
messages.msgSnippet: I read about this group in Runner s World. It s a running club for homeschooled kids run by Patti Dillon, a former top marathon runner who is now homeschooling
messages.messageBody:
I read about this group in Runner's World. It's a
running club for homeschooled kids run by Patti
Dillon, a former top marathon runner who is now
homeschooling her kids. Cool!
http://www.homeschooledharriers.com/

Donna in Nova Scotia (runmum :-)

messages.subject: Ugh. Editing my comments
messages.msgSnippet: Somehow the following paragraph got edited weird and I didn t re-read it.
messages.messageBody:
Somehow the following paragraph got edited weird and I didn't
re-read it.

<<Writing? I teach writing online to homeschooling families. The
main thing I can say is this. Kids whose mothers worry about
their kids writing tend to produce kids who either hate to write or
lifeless, stiff writers. Mothers who back off, spend tons of time
talking with their children, read lots of good literature and where
writing that is produced is enjoyed and read tend to produce
better writters.>>

Should read:

Writing? I teach writing online to homeschooling families. The
main thing I can say is this. Kids whose mothers worry about
whether their kids will write well or not tend to produce kids who
either hate to write or who become lifeless, stiff writers. Mothers
who back off, spend tons of time talking with their children, read
lots of good literature and enjoy the writing their kids do by
reading it, tend to produce good writers.

Can't let my paragraph on writing go when it was so awkward!
Needed a good edit. <vbg>

Julie
